title: Climate activists urge action as world leaders meet at U.N.
text:
German Chancellor Angela Merkel talks to 16-year-old Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg during the 2019 United Nations Climate Action Summit at U.N. headquarters in New York City, New York, U.S., September 23, 2019. Steffen...more

German Chancellor Angela Merkel talks to 16-year-old Swedish climate activist Greta Thunberg during the 2019 United Nations Climate Action Summit at U.N. headquarters in New York City, New York, U.S., September 23, 2019. Steffen Seibert/Bundesregierung/Handout via REUTERS THIS IMAGE HAS BEEN SUPPLIED BY A THIRD PARTY. NO RESALES. NO ARCHIVES.
